title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 156.4 - Withdrawals; distributions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 156.4 - Withdrawals; distributions

State Regulations
A designated beneficiary is eligible for a distribution from
accumulated funds deferred to his or her NY ABLE account in full or partial
disbursement options. Withdrawals from an account may be made on such notice as
is determined to be feasible by the program manager. Notes

ยง
156.4

Adopted

New

York State Register July 12, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 28, eff. 7/12/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
